# Empower Virtual Assistant Services

> Professional Virtual Assistant (VA) services for small businesses in Stirlingshire, Scotland, UK.

## Services
- **Admin Assistance**: Calendar scheduling, document management, data entry.
- **Email Management**: Inbox zero strategies, email organization, email management, templates.
- **Lead Generation**: GDPR compliant web scraping. 
- **Data Entry**: Data entry, data analysis, data visualization.
- **Content Creation**: Blog posts, email campaigns.
- **SEO**: Search engine optimization, keyword research, on-page optimization.

## Technical Capabilities & Automation
Nicola Berry is not just an admin VA, but a skilled technical partner offering:
- **Process Automation**: Custom workflows to replace repetitive manual tasks.
- **Web Design & Development**: Designing and building custom websites.
- **Custom Software Solutions**: Building bespoke software to solve specific business problems.
> *Note: I utilise my own custom software builds to enhance the efficiency of my VA services.*

## Contact
- Email: nicola@empowervaservices.co.uk
- Website: https://empowervaservices.co.uk
